xx2 <- glm_hmm2_seeds %>%

  order_states_glm_hmm() |>

xx2


yy <-  glm_hmm2_seeds %>%
  mutate(fit = list(glm_hmm_extract_best(fit))) 

yyy <- yy |> 
  select(-data) |> 
  unnest_wider(fit) |> 
  select(subject, recovered_weights) |> 
  unnest(recovered_weights) |> 
   filter(coef == "V2")
